sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Link as Scroll } from 'react-scroll' import ScriptTag from 'react-script-tag/lib/ScriptTag' import Footer from './footer' import Navbar from './navbar' import Trending_courses from './trending_courses' import Back_to_top from './back_to_top' import { useLocation } from 'react-router' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet' import Latest_courses from './latest_courses' const Homepage = () => { let path = useLocation(); return ( <> {/* Hero section starts */}

Learn Today
Learn From Home

We make learning convenient and teaching easy

Buy a Course
{/* Hero section Ends */} {/* About section starts */}

Online Learning.

With our Learning Management Web application, we have made:

  • Learning easy by studying right from the comfort of your home or wherever.
  • Teaching more fun and monetary as tutors can upload there materials and millions of students can access them.
  • Learning in general fun.
{/* About section Ends */} {/* */}

Students

Courses

Events

Trainers

{/* */} {/* Why us section starts */}

Learning Made Easy

With our Learning Management Application, we've made learning fun and interesting as well as teaching fun.

Learn More

Learning made easy

Your can learn with ease from the comfort of your home.

Teaching made fun

Reach out to more numbers of students by posting your courses on our platform and make money doing that.

{/* Why us section ends */} {/* About section starts */}

Become a Tutor.

With our Learning Management Web application, we have made:

  • Learning easy by studying right from the comfort of your home or wherever.
  • Teaching more fun and monetary as tutors can upload there materials and millions of students can access them.
  • Learning in general fun.
{/* About section Ends */}
) } export default Homepage
